name: canshare-who-haematology-plasma-cell-other-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid plasma cell neoplasm and other diseases with paraproteins other histology
description: Histologies used for plasma cell neoplasms and other diseases with paraprotiens that are not amyloidosis or multiple myeloma (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours) or an 'Other' value.

filter.value: (^297081000210100 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid plasma cell neoplasms and other diseases with paraproteins histology reference set| MINUS (^297111000210107 |New Zealand World Health Organization classification of tumors 5th edition hematolymphoid myeloma histology reference set| OR ^297121000210102 |New Zealand WHO classification of tumours (5th edition) haematolymphoid amyloidosis histology reference set|)) OR 74964007 |Other|
